dataObjects.rights: © International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.rightsHolder: International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: De Grave, S., Klotz, W. & Cai, X. 2013. Atyoida pilipes. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description:
Red List Category
LC
Least Concern

Red List Criteria

Version
3.1

Year Assessed
2013

Assessor/s
De Grave, S., Klotz, W. & Cai, X.

Reviewer/s
Cumberlidge, N. & Smith, K.

Contributor/s

Justification
This species is widespread in the Pacific, ranging from the Philippines and Lesser Sunda Islands through to the Pacific high islands (Chace 1983) where it occurs in fast flowing streams. In view of its wide distribution and the absence of any specific threats, the species is considered as least Concern.
